# Accounting & Audit â€“ Domain Overview

## Scope
The Accounting & Audit domain governs financial recording, classification,
reconciliation, and auditability of financial events across the enterprise.

This domain ensures that financial records accurately reflect economic reality.

## Characteristics
- High precision and consistency requirements
- Strong alignment with accounting standards
- Full traceability and explainability
- Long-term data retention obligations

## Domain Authority
This domain is authoritative for:
- Accounting entries
- Financial classifications
- Audit controls and evidence
- Reporting alignment with standards

Other domains may supply source events but must not redefine accounting outcomes.
